translation.en: [man] Hey, tell Marie I'm on my way. I'm headed to the hospital now.
translation.it: Di' a Marie che arrivo. Sto correndo in ospedale.

translation.en: And tell her I love her.
And everything's gonna be okay.
Hey, call me when you get this and let me know what's going on.
-Marie? -Nah, it's DiAngelo.
-You talk to her yet? -I can't get through to her.
translation.it: - Le hai già parlato? - Non risponde.

translation.en: Her cousin Teresa isn't picking up either.
She's gonna pull through, man. The baby, too.
translation.it: Ce la farà. E anche il bambino.

translation.en: Yeah. They will.
Hey, look, I gotta go, I gotta try her again.
I'll catch up with you later.
Yeah, I'll catch you later, man. Call me back when you hear some--
translation.it: Sì, ci sentiamo dopo. Chiamami quando sai...

translation.en: You okay, Pete?
What happened?
He came out of nowhere.
[officer] DiAngelo.
What condition's he in? Male, female, what?
I don't know.
What the fuck you do, Jablonski?
[officer] Who's over there, Di?
Stay on the fucking road.
Put it in the trunk.
Di.
You talk to your wife yet?
How's she doing?
What the fuck are you talking about?
No one saw you, right?
translation.it: Non ti ha visto nessuno, vero?

translation.en: Yo, Di!
This is what's gonna happen.
You're gonna leave right now. Go.
translation.it: Tu adesso te ne vai, muoviti.

translation.en: -[officer] Di, what the fuck? -Shut up!
-No, we got to call it in. -He's dead.
There's nothing you can do for him.
Did you go over there?
Did you see what's in that ditch?
translation.it: Hai visto che c'è là sotto?

translation.en: They're gonna crucify you for this.
Every one of us is gonna pay for this. You understand what I'm saying, right?
translation.it: La faranno pagare a ciascuno di noi. Capisci che sto dicendo?

translation.en: No one's gonna find him here, okay?
translation.it: Non lo troveranno mai, qui. Ok?

translation.en: No one's gotta know.
I said I got this.
translation.it: Ho detto che ci penso io.

translation.en: Get to the hospital. Go be with your wife.
translation.it: Va' in ospedale. Sta' con tua moglie.

translation.en: Drive away.
[DiAngelo] Get it out of the road.
Where do you want me to put it?
-[Marie] Yeah. -What are you doing to her?
It's okay. Don't look so worried. It's just a little spotting.
translation.it: Va tutto bene. Non preoccuparti. Era solo qualche perdita.

translation.en: Did you see Teresa? She was-- She just walked out.
translation.it: Hai visto Teresa? È appena uscita.

translation.en: Dr. Taranaweh ran an ultrasound. I can pull it up for you if you want.
translation.it: Il dottor Taranaweh ha fatto un'ecografia. Vuole vederla?

translation.en: No, why don't you get the fucking doctor?
translation.it: No, mi chiami il dottore, cazzo.

translation.en: Yeah. Sure.
Seriously, Petey?
That was rude.
No, you said you were bleeding.
It stopped.
-You-- -It's fine. I promise.
Hey, come here. Come here.
We're past the five month mark, Pete.
I have a good feeling, you know?
Yeah, I know. No, it's just...
translation.it: Sì, lo so. No, è che...

translation.en: -You just scared me there. -I know. I know.
translation.it: Mi hai fatto spaventare. Lo so.

translation.en: What happened?
It was nothing. No, we just...
-We were working. -[nurse] Doc will be here in a minute.
translation.it: - Stavamo lavorando. - Il dottore arriva subito.

translation.en: [nurse] It'll turn itself off.
Babe.
There he is.
Little Poke.
-[woman] Don't lose anymore, all right? -[school bell rings]
translation.it: Non devi perdere più niente, d'accordo?

translation.en: Those things are expensive. Last pair. All right.
translation.it: È roba costosa. Ultimo paio. Va bene?

translation.en: Excuse me.
-You waiting for somebody? -Yeah, my brother.
He's supposed to be here.
What grade is he in?
Sixth.
No, sixth graders, they left already, so that means he left too.
translation.it: La prima media è già andata via, se ne sarà andato anche lui.

translation.en: -Is there somebody you want to call? -Yeah, I just did. My mom.
translation.it: - Vuoi chiamare qualcuno? - Sì, già fatto, mia madre.

translation.en: Maybe your brother walked home?
translation.it: Forse se n'è andato a piedi?

translation.en: He didn't.
He takes his bike to school.
[woman] What your brother would be doing down here is beyond me.
translation.it: Che dovrebbe fare tuo fratello qui, non riesco a capirlo.

translation.en: He's not here. He's at the park.
translation.it: Non è qui. È al parco.

translation.en: [woman] Do you see him?
Where else do you think he could be?
translation.it: Dove altro credi che possa essere?

translation.en: I don't know.
What the fuck?
Little shit.
-[door shuts] -Fuck off.
[Ryan] I, uh...
kind of sat on this. Sorry.
translation.it: Mi ci sono seduto sopra. Scusi.

translation.en: It's okay.
What is that?
[woman] It's a seagull.
My son Brenton made it.
[girl] Wow. It's cool.
Put on your seat belts. If we hurry up, we can get you home
translation.it: Allacciate le cinture. Se ci sbrighiamo, sarete a casa

translation.en: before it really starts kicking up.
[bartender] Ready for another?
-I got tied up on the turnpike. So sorry. -[clerk] All rise.
translation.it: - Ero bloccata in autostrada, scusate. - In piedi.

translation.en: Superior court of Hudson County, state of New Jersey, is now in session,
translation.it: La Corte Suprema della Contea di Hudson è ora in seduta.

translation.en: Honorable Richard Blatt presiding.
Please sit.
Your Honor, the State presents complaint number...
translation.it: Vostro Onore, l'Accusa presenta il procedimento numero...

translation.en: Uh, it's... Got it. Uh, it's...
complaint number 5977.
This is the defendant's third shoplifting charge.
translation.it: È la terza volta che l'imputata è accusata di taccheggio.

translation.en: Ms. Lufts stole $200 in cat food.
translation.it: La sig.ra Lufts ha rubato $200 in cibo per gatti.

translation.en: You've got the wrong defendant.
That's not the complaint number I'm looking at, Counselor.
translation.it: Non è il numero di procedimento che ho io, avvocato.

translation.en: Get your paperwork in order before you walk into my courtroom.
translation.it: Metta i documenti in ordine prima di entrare nella mia aula.

translation.en: -Your Honor, I have it right here. It-- -[judge] Next.
translation.it: - Vostro Onore, è qui... - Il prossimo.

translation.en: [man] Our county is the gold standard in law enforcement.
translation.it: La nostra contea è un modello di collaborazione

translation.en: Working hand in hand with its citizens.
The police violence we're witnessing
translation.it: Le violenze ai danni delle comunità nere e ispaniche

translation.en: in black and brown communities throughout America
translation.it: Le violenze ai danni delle comunità nere e ispaniche non trovano spazio, in New Jersey.

translation.en: has no place in New Jersey.
translation.it: non trovano spazio, in New Jersey.

translation.en: As prosecutor, good police and community relations have been a priority in my administration.
translation.it: Buona polizia e rapporti tra comunità sono una priorità.

translation.en: [reporter] Mr. Connelly, when are you announcing your run for governor?
translation.it: Sig. Connelly, quando si candiderà a governatore?

translation.en: [man] Darius!
Darius!
[woman] He was a little off-beat though.
translation.it: Però era un po' fuori tempo.

translation.en: -Gotta tell you. -[man] No.
I saw Brother Jerrel and you saw Brother Jerrel too.
translation.it: Ho visto Fratello Jerrel e anche tu.

translation.en: And who he was looking at.
-[man chuckling] -Oh, you are crazy!
'Saiah, you know that woman is married.
I know, I'm just saying she looked good after she lost all that weight.
translation.it: Lo so, ma è in forma da quando è dimagrita!

translation.en: Brenton? Baby, you home?
Brenton! Your mama's calling you, boy!
He should be here by now. Or did he forget about tonight too?
translation.it: Dovrebbe essere qui, se non l'ha dimenticato.

translation.en: No, Uncle Seth's coming home, and that's all he could talk about.
translation.it: No, Zio Seth torna a casa. Lui non parla d'altro.

translation.en: He is so excited. He's got a surprise for the both of you.
translation.it: È tutto eccitato. Ha una sorpresa per tutti e due.

translation.en: What? That he forgot his uncle's homecoming?
translation.it: Che si è dimenticato dello zio?

translation.en: Aw, come on, he's either in the yard or upstairs in his room. I'll check.
translation.it: Andiamo! Sarà o in cortile o di sopra in camera sua. Vado a vedere.

translation.en: I see he's been messing with my TV again.
translation.it: Mi ha di nuovo incasinato la TV.

translation.en: I can't turn it on if he's done playing with his damn video games.
translation.it: Non posso usarla, se non la smette coi videogame.

translation.en: Well, maybe you should leave it off seeing as you got a whole house to paint.
translation.it: Lasciala spenta, hai una casa da imbiancare.

translation.en: [automated voice] You have one new message.
[man] Yeah, we're looking for the parents of Brenton Butler.
translation.it: Cerchiamo i genitori di Brenton Butler.

translation.en: Could you call the South District police station when you get the message?
translation.it: Dovreste chiamare la centrale del distretto Sud.

translation.en: It concerns your son.
I heard the callout.
[officer] Found him with a BMX bike that's pretty banged up.
translation.it: Aveva una BMX che è ridotta maluccio.

translation.en: [detective] Got any ID on the kid?
Brenton Butler. Black male, 15 years old.
translation.it: Brenton Butler. Maschio nero, quindici anni.

translation.en: Notified the parents. He's at the ER at Jersey City Medical Center in surgery.
translation.it: Abbiamo avvisato i genitori, è in ospedale, lo stanno operando.

translation.en: [detective] Anyone have a conversation with the parents?
translation.it: Qualcuno ha parlato con i genitori?

translation.en: [officer] Wanted to wait for you.
-He's alive? -[officer 2] Yeah.
He's probably fucking brain dead. It's like the Red Sea down there.
translation.it: Sarà in morte cerebrale. Sembra il Mar Rosso, laggiù.

translation.en: -Hey. I'm sorry, brother. Um... -You gotta wait.
I'm sorry. It's my son. He's been in a car accident.
translation.it: Scusi, mio figlio ha avuto un incidente.

translation.en: You got to wait in line.
We're sorry, we don't know what's going on with our son. Please?
translation.it: Scusate, non sappiamo come sta nostro figlio.

translation.en: -Thank you, thank you, thank you. -His name is Brenton. Brenton Butler.
translation.it: - Grazie. - Si chiama Brenton. Brenton Butler.

translation.en: [receptionist] There's no "r." It's "Benton."
Gave me the wrong spelling. I'll need you to fill this out.
-Do you have your insurance card, ID? -[woman] Yeah.
Have a seat, the doctor will talk to you when he's done in surgery.
translation.it: Il dottore vi parlerà dopo l'intervento.

translation.en: Surgery?
Just have a seat. The doctor will talk to you when he's done.
-Why would he be in surgery? -I don't know.
They don't tell us these things.
Please, just have a seat.
Surgery?
[Isaiah mutters] Why is he in surgery?
Why do they have him in surgery? Why's he in surgery?
translation.it: Perché è in sala operatoria? Perché?

translation.en: Father God, praise be to you.
Your glory, your mercy.
translation.it: la Tua gloria, la Tua misericordia.

translation.en: Watch over our baby.
Please don't let my baby die, Father God. I don't know...
translation.it: Ti prego, non lasciare che il mio bambino muoia. Non lo so...

translation.en: I ask this in your holy name.
translation.it: Lo chiedo nel Tuo santo nome.

translation.en: Please, Father God. Look after my...
translation.it: Ti prego, Dio Padre, prenditi cura del mio...

translation.en: Fuck. [breath trembling]
You're fine, you're fine, you're fine. -You're fine. -[windshield wipers scraping]
I'd been sleeping in my car under the Pulaski the whole day.
translation.it: Ho dormito nella mia auto sotto il ponte Pulaski tutto il giorno.

translation.en: Nobody bothers me there,
except when that cop came banging on my window.
translation.it: ma poi quello sbirro mi ha bussato sul vetro.

translation.en: Did you drive through the park this morning?
No, I-- I told you I was sleeping under the Pulaski all day.
translation.it: No, le ho appena detto che ho dormito sotto il Pulaski tutto il giorno.

translation.en: [man] Drinking too, right? -All the live long day. -[knocking, door opens]
translation.it: E ha anche bevuto, vero? Tutto il giorno.

translation.en: You the on-call AP?
Yeah, I'm KJ Harper. They just put me back on an hour ago.
translation.it: Sì, sono KJ Harper. Mi hanno richiamata un'ora fa.

translation.en: Right. One of my CIs tipped us off to this guy.
translation.it: Un informatore ci ha fatto una soffiata.

translation.en: Saw Gramps here cleaning blood off the front of his car
translation.it: Ha visto il nonnino che puliva il sangue dall'auto,

translation.en: near the park this morning.
We just picked him up riding around near there,
two sheets to the wind.
Why's narcotics interested in a hit-and-run?
translation.it: Da quando la Narcotici si occupa di incidenti?

translation.en: We just got a tip.
-Hmm. -And he looks good for it.
Two prior DUIs, it's a matter of time before he killed someone.
translation.it: Due guide in stato di ebbrezza. Prima o poi doveva ammazzare qualcuno.

translation.en: That's in the report. You read that, right?
translation.it: È scritto sul rapporto. L'ha letto, no?

translation.en: Of course I did.
I just didn't realize reports were read by every Joe in the district.
translation.it: Ma non credevo che li leggessero cani e porci nel distretto.

translation.en: [chuckles] Every...
I've seen you before, down at the courthouse.
translation.it: Io ti ho già vista, giù in tribunale.

translation.en: You work the shoplifting cases.
You got this tied up with a bow.
translation.it: Te l'ho servito su un piatto d'argento.

translation.en: You got enough for a plea without lifting one bejeweled nail.
translation.it: Puoi andare a processo senza alzare un dito.

translation.en: -[cell phone buzzing] -I know how to do my job, but thanks.
translation.it: So come fare il mio lavoro, ma grazie.

translation.en: Well, then do it.
Mr. Dorsey seems to believe he was asleep in his car.
translation.it: Il signor Dorsey afferma che dormiva in auto.

translation.en: Well, what's he gonna say?
"Oh, I just rolled over some kid's head in my Buick, my bad"?
translation.it: "Sono passato sopra la testa di un ragazzo con la mia Buick"?

translation.en: [DiAngelo laughing] Come on.
Okay. Thanks.
The trash can's down there.
This fucking guy. It's your boy, Jablonski.
translation.it: Quello stronzo. È il ragazzo nuovo, Jablonski.

translation.en: He keeps calling.
[Dorsey] I didn't kill no kid. I was sleeping.
translation.it: Non ho ucciso nessuno. Stavo dormendo.

translation.en: [detective] Yo! Ms. Harper!
Are you the assistant prosecutor on my job?
translation.it: È l'assistente procuratore del mio caso?

translation.en: I'm Joe Rinaldi. You can call me Fish.
translation.it: Io sono Joe Rinaldi. Mi chiami Fish.

translation.en: Uh, former NYPD,
but I just got this new place out on the water. It's fucking beautiful.
translation.it: ma ho appena comprato una casa sul fiume. Cazzo, è bellissima.

translation.en: The kids love it, so I figured, fuck it, why not Jersey.
translation.it: E ho pensato: "'Fanculo, perché non il New Jersey?"

translation.en: -Did you need something from me? -Uh, yeah.
Yeah. The guys in there said that you're ready to file this job.
translation.it: I ragazzi hanno detto che sei pronta a presentare il fascicolo.

translation.en: -You got enough for that? -Yep.
Yep. Okey-dokey. Um...
Yo, are you going to the hospital? I need to pick up the victim's belongings.
translation.it: Ehi, vai in ospedale? Per gli effetti personali...

translation.en: -Yeah. Yeah, I am. -Mind if I ride with?
Sure. Yeah.
If we pass a bodega en route, think about picking up some mints.
translation.it: Se vedi un emporio, comprati delle mentine.

translation.en: I'm just-- I don't care.
I'm just saying, out of respect for the family.
translation.it: Lo dico per rispetto alla famiglia.

translation.en: I can smell you like a mile away. Not a good look.
translation.it: Si sente lontano un miglio. Fa un brutto effetto.

translation.en: Actually, I have to go to the office for some paperwork, so...
translation.it: Devo passare in ufficio a prendere delle carte.

translation.en: Get your own ride there.
What'd they do to my boy? What'd they do to my boy?
translation.it: Che hanno fatto al mio bambino?

translation.en: -[man] Be with you every step of the way. -[Seth] It's all good, bro.
translation.it: Va tutto bene, fratello. Sii forte.

translation.en: It's all right.
[Seth] It's gonna be all right. It's gonna be all right.
Brenton, he was counting the days to see you in uniform.
translation.it: Brenton contava i giorni, voleva vederti in uniforme.

translation.en: It's been a while. He's so proud.
translation.it: Dopo tanto tempo! È così fiero.

translation.en: And he wants to hear all the stories about Afghanistan and Kandastan.
translation.it: E vuole sentirti raccontare dell'Afghanistan e di Kandastan.

translation.en: Are you the parents of Brenton Butler?
-Uh, yeah. -He's stable.
I was able to relieve the pressure on his brain,
translation.it: Sono riuscita a ridurre la pressione sul cervello.

translation.en: but there's been significant impact,
primarily to the posterior cortex, the back of his head.
translation.it: soprattutto alla corteccia posteriore, dietro alla testa.

translation.en: What does that mean?
He could lose the ability to function independently.
He could be on a ventilator for a long time.
translation.it: e usare un respiratore a lungo.

translation.en: What happened? Was he at school?
translation.it: Com'è successo? È andato a scuola?

translation.en: -The police haven't told us. -[doctor] I don't know. I'm sorry.
translation.it: - Non ci hanno detto niente. - Non lo so.

translation.en: Uh, can we see him now?
Not everyone right now, just the parents.
translation.it: Non tutti, per adesso. Solo i genitori.

translation.en: -You can come with me. -Okay.
-Where's DiAngelo at? -Come here.
Not picking up his phone. No one's picking up.
[Pete] Now what the fuck is going on?
DiAngelo would fucking lose his mind if he saw you here.
translation.it: Si incazzerebbe di brutto se ti vedesse qui.

translation.en: We're taking care of it.
The kid's alive. Now that's what you call taking care of it? Huh?
translation.it: Il ragazzo è vivo. È così che ve ne occupate?

translation.en: You think we fucking knew that?
Look, all I'm saying is there's got to be another way.
translation.it: Sto solo dicendo che deve esserci un altro modo.

translation.en: This is wrong, and you know it is.
translation.it: Questo è sbagliato. E lo sai anche tu.

translation.en: This whole thing's gonna blow up.
And we're all gonna go to prison for a fucking accident.
translation.it: Finiremo in prigione per un fottuto incidente.

translation.en: A white cop and a black kid?
translation.it: Uno sbirro bianco e un ragazzo nero?

translation.en: Don't you watch the news?
There are no fucking accidents anymore, and you know it.
translation.it: I "fottuti incidenti" non esistono più. E lo sai.

translation.en: The assistant prosecutor's filing papers on a guy tonight. It's over.
translation.it: L'assistente procuratore ha già un imputato. È finita.

translation.en: What guy?
Who cares, man? Not you.
translation.it: E che ti importa? Non sei tu.

translation.en: Excuse me, I just started the Narcotics Unit here.
translation.it: Scusami. Sono appena entrato nella Narcotici.

translation.en: DiAngelo's team?
You know who's um... who's working the hit-and-run in the park?
translation.it: Sai dirmi chi lavora all'incidente nel parco?

translation.en: Another new guy, Rinaldi. He's out, left an hour ago.
translation.it: È nuovo anche lui, Rinaldi. È uscito un'ora fa.

translation.en: -[Pete] Know when he's gonna be back? -I have no idea.
translation.it: - E sai quando torna? - Non ne ho idea.

translation.en: Do you want to leave a message?
What about the captain? You got his name?
translation.it: No. Sai come si chiama il capitano?

translation.en: You got a report, you can turn it in to your supervising officer.
translation.it: Se devi fare rapporto, fallo al tuo superiore.

translation.en: I gotta talk to the captain. Direct.
translation.it: Devo parlare con il capitano. Direttamente.

translation.en: I'll leave my cell, all right?
translation.it: Ti lascio il mio cellulare. Ok?

translation.en: Just make sure he gets it.
Got the kid's clothing. How about you?
translation.it: Gli abiti del ragazzo. Come va?

translation.en: Get all your personal business taken care of?
Pick up some milk? Go to the bank?
That's good. That's important.
[Fish] Mr. Butler? Mrs. Butler?
Who are you?
We're with the prosecutor's office. We're looking for the parents.
translation.it: Ufficio del Procuratore, cerchiamo i genitori.

translation.en: I'm Detective Rinaldi. This is KJ Harper.
translation.it: Sono il detective Rinaldi. KJ Harper.

translation.en: [Isaiah] What happened to my son?
-They said he was in a car accident. -[Latrice] Yeah.
No one's talked to us. The police haven't said anything.
translation.it: Nessuno ha parlato con noi, la polizia non ha detto niente.

translation.en: [Fish] Uh, we need some privacy right now to talk. Please.
translation.it: Avremmo bisogno di un po' di privacy per parlare, per favore.

translation.en: Joseph, can you give us a minute?
There's a waiting room at the end of the hall.
translation.it: C'è una sala di attesa, laggiù.

translation.en: There'll be a bail hearing tomorrow before the arraignment at the courthouse.
translation.it: Domani ci sarà l'udienza per la cauzione, in tribunale...

translation.en: [Seth] That's not what they asked.
We need to know exactly how this happened.
Your son was in a hit-and-run this morning at Liberty State Park.
[Isaiah] This morning?
They didn't call us until a few hours ago.
translation.it: Ci hanno chiamati poche ore fa.

translation.en: That's when they found him, earlier tonight.
Two people found him. Their dog, actually.
translation.it: Due persone, o meglio il loro cane.

translation.en: [KJ] We have the man in custody who we believe did this.
translation.it: Abbiamo in custodia il presunto responsabile.

translation.en: I'll be filing paperwork with the judge tonight
translation.it: Stasera presento i documenti al giudice,

translation.en: for his hearing first thing tomorrow.
Can you be a little more clear with the details? I...
[KJ] Oh... Oh, I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
[Fish] It's a nice bike your son's got.
Five Kings rides them too.
That series of BMX goes for some serious bank.
translation.it: Quella serie di BMX costa parecchio.

translation.en: What are you implying?
That Brenton's with a gang? Really? You gonna do this now?
translation.it: Che è in una gang? Le sembra il caso?

translation.en: Wanna step back, whoever you are, and let me talk to the family?
translation.it: Chiunque sia, mi fa parlare con la famiglia?

translation.en: I am family, and I don't appreciate you coming up in here
translation.it: Io ne faccio parte e lei non può venire qui

translation.en: -and accusing my nephew-- -[Isaiah] Seth, let me handle this.
translation.it: - ad accusare mio nipote... - Seth. Lascia fare a me.

translation.en: We bought the bike.
Brenton's 16th birthday's coming up soon.
Now, what's gonna happen to the man who did this?
Well, I'll be charging Mr. Dorsey
with leaving the scene of a motor vehicle accident
translation.it: di fuga dalla scena di un incidente

translation.en: resulting in serious bodily injury.
And I'll suggest the maximum sentence for this type of felony.
translation.it: E consiglierò la massima pena prevista.

translation.en: Which is what, exactly?
Three to five years.
My son laid in the cold...
translation.it: Mio figlio è rimasto al freddo,

translation.en: in the snow, in pain...
for hours.
And no one came for him except a dog.
translation.it: E nessuno è venuto a cercarlo, tranne un cane.

translation.en: He may never walk again.
He may never wake up again.
And you're telling me that the person that did this
translation.it: E lei mi dice che al responsabile

translation.en: will get three to five years?
translation.it: daranno da tre a cinque anni?

translation.en: That man deserves to die for what he did to my son!
translation.it: Merita di morire, per ciò che ha fatto a mio figlio!

translation.en: I'm sorry.
[Fish] My card.
-[KJ sighs] Damn it. -[alarm chirps]
You're locking yourself out doing it like that. Just click it once.
translation.it: Così ti chiudi fuori, premi una volta sola.

translation.en: I don't need to be told how to unlock my damn car.
translation.it: Non insegnarmi ad aprire la mia dannata auto!

translation.en: What? Come on. Harper!
-[Fish] Come on! -[knocking]
-[starts engine] -But we gotta go to impound.
We gotta get the paperwork on Dorsey's car.
translation.it: Ci servono i documenti dell'auto di Dorsey.

translation.en: -[Fish] Harper, please. -[knocking]
Harper, look. Look.
This is you when the night's done and you don't have to see me anymore.
translation.it: Questa sei tu dopo stanotte. Quando non dovrai vedermi più.

translation.en: [Fish] Thank you.
[pastor] Today we claim promises over our son Brenton.
translation.it: Oggi Ti ricordiamo le Tue promesse, per nostro figlio Brenton.

translation.en: We believe in the healing power of faith and prayer
translation.it: Crediamo nel potere curativo di fede e preghiera.

translation.en: and ask you to begin your mighty work in the life of Brenton.
translation.it: Ti chiediamo di intraprendere la Tua potente opera nella vita di Brenton.

translation.en: Lord, your word speaks promises of healing and restoration.
translation.it: Signore, la Tua parola annuncia promesse di guarigione e restaurazione.

translation.en: And we thank you for the miracles you still perform today.
translation.it: Ti ringraziamo per i miracoli che compi ancora oggi.

translation.en: Is he gonna live?
What?
[Pete] I'm sorry. I was in the wrong room.
I'm gonna turn myself in.
But nobody's gotta know none of you were there.
translation.it: Non serve dire che c'eravate anche voi.

translation.en: Just to be clear...
this is what's gonna happen.
Well, they are gonna fuck you...
for Ferguson...
Chicago, Baltimore...
for every white cop who ever killed a black kid.
translation.it: per ogni sbirro bianco che abbia mai ucciso un nero.

translation.en: -It was an accident. -No one gives a shit.
translation.it: - È stato un incidente. - Se ne sbattono le palle.

translation.en: So, before you do anything,
I want you to think about what kind of father you'd be behind bars...
translation.it: pensa a che padre saresti dietro le sbarre,

translation.en: out of your son's life.
translation.it: fuori dalla vita di tuo figlio.

translation.en: He ain't ever gonna know you.
You're a good cop, I see it. That's why I picked you.
translation.it: Sei un bravo agente, lo vedo, ti ho scelto per questo.

translation.en: You and me? We're a dying breed.
translation.it: Tu e io siamo una razza in estinzione.

translation.en: And we take care of our own, you understand?
translation.it: E proteggiamo i nostri simili. Hai capito?

translation.en: [DiAngelo] Don't go behind my back again.
translation.it: Non muoverti più alle mie spalle.

translation.en: [Fish] I need the paperwork on my hit-and-run. It's Mac Dorsey's car.
Who's the owner of the car? We need a signature.
translation.it: A chi è intestata? Serve una firma.

translation.en: [Fish] I told you, Mac Dorsey.
They need your John Hancock!
You want to wait inside?
It'll take about half an hour to release the paperwork on the vehicle.
translation.it: Ci vorrà mezz'ora per i documenti del veicolo.

translation.en: [KJ] I'll wait in the car.
Why? It's just a sign off.
[man] My supervisor's on break.
translation.it: Il mio superiore è in pausa.

translation.en: It's two in the fucking morning, what's he doing?
translation.it: Sono le due, che cazzo sta facendo?

translation.en: [man] It's out of my hands. You can wait inside--
translation.it: Non dipende da me. Aspetti dentro.

translation.en: -[cell phone buzzes] -Rather freeze my balls off. Thanks.
[Fish] Hey.
Well, you gotta use the tape on the diaper, I told you that.
translation.it: Devi mettere lo scotch sul pannolino,

translation.en: Or he's gonna be dropping shit bombs all over the place.
translation.it: o sgancerà bombe di merda dappertutto.

translation.en: Well, use your head.
How's Lizzie doing? Give her the hamburger yet?
translation.it: Come sta Lizzie? Hai visto l'hamburger che le ho dato?

translation.en: What do you mean what about them? They've been depressed all week.
translation.it: Come sarebbe "perché"? Sono depressi da giorni.

translation.en: [Fish] You gonna hit that?
Because there's a cream.
[KJ] What?
I'm telling you, hobo herpes, it's a thing. I swear to God.
translation.it: "L'herpes del barbone" è una brutta bestia, te lo giuro.

translation.en: Did you see Dorsey's face?
translation.it: Non hai visto che faccia ha Dorsey?

translation.en: That pastor of yours found a chapel downstairs.
translation.it: Quel pastore ha trovato una cappella.

translation.en: Wants you to head down for some holy rolling with Jesus.
translation.it: Vi aspetta per un sacro incontro...

translation.en: Seth. Enough.
Why'd you tell the police we bought Brenton that bike?
translation.it: Perché hai mentito su quella bici?

translation.en: You saw his face.
He already had his mind made up that he was in a gang.
translation.it: Era già convinto che facesse parte di una gang.

translation.en: Because of what? The bike?
Where'd he get it from?
What was he doing in that park?
I won't tolerate you covering up for him anymore.
translation.it: Non ti permetterò di coprirlo mai più.

translation.en: I know he'd been going back to the projects, and that park,
translation.it: È tornato alle case popolari e al parco.

translation.en: after I explicitly told him not to go.
translation.it: Gli avevo detto di non farlo.

translation.en: 'Saiah, he misses his friends.
translation.it: Isaiah, gli mancano i suoi amici.

translation.en: He misses his home.
That's not his home.
Not anymore.
I don't know where he got it.
[Seth] You ought to go with him.
Go on, Tricey. I'll stay here with B.
translation.it: Vai pure, Trice. Resto io qui con B.

translation.en: He's gonna suffocate Brenton with all of his worries.
translation.it: Soffocherà Brenton con tutte le sue preoccupazioni.

translation.en: Just like he did you.
Kid must've been conscious for a while.
translation.it: Dev'essere rimasto cosciente per un po'.

translation.en: He's stuck between these two snowbanks here.
translation.it: È bloccato tra questi due banchi di neve.

translation.en: Crawling around,
trying to find a way out, probably screaming for his mama.
translation.it: cerca una via d'uscita, invoca sua madre.

translation.en: Crime scene photos give you the heebie-jeebies?
I don't need to look at them.
Isn't that, like, your job? [clears throat]
Nope. My job is to file paperwork.
translation.it: No. Il mio lavoro è depositare documenti.

translation.en: File paperwork? You could file paperwork at any fuck-face firm down on the water.
translation.it: Depositare documenti! Puoi farlo in qualunque studio legale del centro.

translation.en: I'm sick of their eyes.
What?
Even when they're dead, it's...
They're looking at you, wanting answers.
You worked Homicide before?
How'd you get bumped to car crimes?
Car crimes. Heh... right.
Paralyzing a kid gets you three to five years, but it's guaranteed you won't do most of that time.
translation.it: Da tre a cinque anni, se paralizzi un bambino, ma è garantito che esci prima.

translation.en: It's the greatest show on Earth, this shit.
translation.it: Questa merda è solo un grande farsa.

translation.en: Did you see the driver's seat in Dorsey's car?
translation.it: Hai visto il sedile di guida di Dorsey?

translation.en: That narc cop said he had to chase him down,
translation.it: Quello della Narcotici ha detto di averlo inseguito.

translation.en: driving around outside the park, right? That's how they caught him.
translation.it: Guidava nei dintorni. L'ha preso così.

translation.en: So?
So, how do you drive lying down?
Here comes asshat. Finally.
-[man] Have a good night. -Whatever. Go fuck yourself.
translation.it: - E buonanotte. - Va' a farti fottere.

translation.en: I'm gonna write up the kid's belongings in the morning. [sniffs]
-Okay. -You know, I can get an Uber from here.
translation.it: - Ok. - Prendo una Uber da qui.

translation.en: But, yo, it was good working with you.
translation.it: È stato bello lavorare con te.

translation.en: Yeah. You too.
And um...
Listen, the dead don't need answers.
translation.it: Senti, ai morti non servono risposte.

translation.en: They're dead. Okay?
See you at trial in the morning. Don't forget about those mints, huh?
translation.it: Ci vediamo domani in aula. Ricorda le mentine.

translation.en: Asshole.
Fuck!
[nurse] Excuse me.
Are you family?
I'm his attorney.
[clerk] Complaint number 39012, the State versus Mac Henry Dorsey.
translation.it: Procedimento numero 39012, lo Stato contro Mac Henry Dorsey.

translation.en: The counselor's appearance for the record.
[judge] Is the State gonna talk?
Judge, it's not my complaint number.
translation.it: Giudice, non è il mio procedimento.

translation.en: Then where the hell is my prosecutor?
[attorney] I'm sorry, Judge. I don't know.
Next case.
[clerk] Complaint number 39013, the State versus Lonny Mendoza.
translation.it: Procedimento numero 39013, lo Stato contro Lonny Mendoza.
